summary: This bill, H.R. 3176, amends the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act to reauthorize the National Volcano Early Warning and Monitoring System. The amendments primarily involve updating the dates for the system's authorization and changing the responsible agencies. Specifically, the amendments shift oversight of the system from the United States Geological Survey to the Secretary and assign the Secretary of Commerce the role previously held by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. The bill aims to ensure the continued operation of the volcano monitoring system through 2030.
